successes.title: ROCKI Wifi Music System, From Every Phone, To All Speakers
successes.description: Free Your Music - From Every Phone, To All Speakers, For Everyone. ROCKI Wifi Music System, Multi-room, Multi-User, Multi-Speakers

Pledges.description: *FIRST* | ROCKI EXCLUSIVE BETA | The same ROCKI "PLAY" device, with beta app & firmware (app & firmware upgrades over the air)

*STANDARD* | ROCKI "PLAY", upgrades all speakers with Audio-in (3.5mm or RCA) to a Wifi Speakers and enjoy ROCKI Wifi Music System, choose one of your favorite color from 6 available color options (state your preference in the final survey after the close of the project)
PLAY Special Edition << SKIP&DIE Loves ROCKI >> | Psychedelic Camouflage Full Color Hardcover edition specially made for SKIP&DIE fans. Read Update#8 for full details

PLAY Special Edition << D.O.N.S. Loves ROCKI >> | D.O.N.S. favorite Black & Gold Color Hardcover edition specially made for D.O.N.S. fans and lovers of EDM (Electronic Dance Music). Read Update#9 for full details

*DIGITAL* | ROCKI PLAY+, same features as the regular PLAY with the addition of Optical (TOSLink) and HDMI (HDMI Audio) connections. Great for audio enthusiasts connecting to receivers / amps / audio processors with digital connectivity. Limited First Batch for Feb shipping.

*ROCKI My Home* Early Bird | Be Revolutionary, be the first to show off your ROCKI Home - a set of 3 ROCKI "PLAY" for your living room, bedroom, bathroom or kitchen! Enjoy ROCKI Multi-room instantly! We'll even give you all 6 colors of ROCKI. ROCKI colors are silicone covers that can be changed easily so you can choose your favorite colorfor each room.

*ROCKI My Home* Standard | Same as "ROCKI My Home" Early Bird, except delivery in January when firmware/app is expected to be completed. Show off your ROCKI Home - a set of 3 ROCKI "PLAY" for your living room, bedroom, bathroom or kitchen! Enjoy ROCKI Multi-room instantly! We'll even give you all 6 colors of ROCKI. ROCKI colors are silicone covers that can be changed easily so you can choose your favorite colorfor each room.

*ROCKI My Home+* | 1x PLAY+ & 2x PLAY. PLAY+ adds digital connections Optical (TOSLink) & HDMI (HDMI Audio). Great with the PLAY+ for that living room sound system receiver / amp / audio processor with digital connectivity. The 2x PLAY for regular speakers in bedroom & bathroom / kitchen or other rooms. Your 2x PLAY can be shipped earlier if you choose to (we will check with you for confirmation when it's time to ship)
Have your name or company name & logo listed on www.MYROCKI.com website as ROCKI Kickstarter Premium Supporter + Pick any of the ROCKI rewards listed above. THANKS!

ROCKI Launch Premium Party !! Support ROCKI to Free Your Music for everyone, we'll throw a party in your town / city and celebrate ROCKI Launch with you and your friends. Like it? Email us at press@myrocki.com
